transport.question: I have wheels and carry people. I stop at many places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🛑 People get on and off me.

transport.question: I float on water and carry people and cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need a large body of water to move.

transport.question: I travel on rails and carry many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I need a special track to move.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and can take you to another country. What am I?
I have two wheels and you use pedals to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need to balance to ride me.
💪 You use your legs to power me.

transport.question: I carry goods on roads, often very long distances. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I fly straight up and down, with spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 I am often used for rescues.

transport.question: I go underwater, and am used for exploring the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I let people see the fish.
💧 I am a type of boat.

transport.question: I'm a type of motorcycle with a sidecar attached. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Two people can ride on me at the same time.
🛵 I have an extra seat next to the driver.

transport.question: I travel to space, exploring planets and stars. What am I?

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
💧 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I say “Meow” and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I like to purr when I am happy.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I love to swim in ponds. Who am I?
I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.

animal.question: I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I often nap during the day.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?
I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can change color to blend in.
🌊 I squirt ink when I am scared.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique, like fingerprints.
🦁 I am often hunted by lions.

animal.question: I build dams and have large, flat tails. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I use my teeth to cut down trees.
🇨🇦 I am the national animal of Canada.
🏠 My home is called a lodge.

animal.question: I'm a reptile with a tough shell and a slow pace. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
